body:
## What's Changed
* GitHub Actions: on workflow_dispatch by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/359
* Drop Python 3.8 by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/334
* Some test refactoring by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/357
* Don't err on non-const references by default by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/305
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/366
* GItHub Actions: No need to run pre-commit twice by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/363
* GitHub Actions: Remove filters to ensure tests are always run by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/364
* fix(indentation_namespace): false positive for MemInitLists by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/353
* refactor 2.0.1 block of changelog by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/370
* chore: Prepare for release v2.0.2 by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/369

## New Contributors
* @pre-commit-ci made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/366

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/compare/2.0.1...2.0.2

Yet another overdue... hotfix. Sorry this took so long.

## What's Changed
* Fix missing comma between items in _CPP_HEADERS by @Hs293Go in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/300
* Fix false positive for indented parameters in namespaces by @norab0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/304
* Fix typos discovered by codespell by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/316
* IWYU: treat stdio.h the same way as cstdio by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/319
* Add pre-commit by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/321
* GitHub Actions: pipx run pre-commit run --all-files by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/324
* README.rst: Add instructions for pre-commit by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/320
* PEP 621: Migrate from setup.{py, cfg} to pyproject.toml by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/315
* README.rst: Use pipx to install cpplint from PyPI by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/325
* Move flake8 from tox to pre-commit by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/326
* Add ruff to pre-commit by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/327
* Prepare for release 2.0.1 and update changelog by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/322
* Add more ruff lint rules by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/328
* Ruff rules for comprehensions and performance by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/329
* Ruff rules PL for Pylint by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/330
* Refactor tests and metadata by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/317
* Add ruff format to pre-commit by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/333
* ruff rules UP for pyupgrade by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/336
* pre-commit autoupdate 2025-03-14 by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/338
* Ruff rules SIM for simplification by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/337
* Ruff rules PT for pytest style by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/332
* ruff rule N805: First argument of a method should be named `self` by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/339
* misc git cleanup by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/340
* cpplint_clitest.py: Function names should be lowercase by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/342
* Mypy: static type checker for Python by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/345
* CONTRIBUTING.rst: Default branch is develop, add pre-commit by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/349
* cpplint_clitest.py: Remove unnecessary class by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/352
* Fix test refactoring by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/350
* suppress C++-only categories on C file extensions by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/318
* All TODOs in Python code should have a username by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/355
* Drop flake8 in favor of ruff by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/356
* pre-commit: Add pre-commit-hooks and auto-walrus by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/351
* Add a GitHub Action to publish to PyPI by @cclauss in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/347
* chore: bump 2.0.1 release date again by @aaronliu0130 in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/335

## New Contributors
* @Hs293Go made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/300

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/compare/2.0.0...2.0.1

A large, long-overdue modernization of the codebase!

## What's Changed
* 🩸Python 2 and 3.7 are no longer supported. Python 3.12 support was added along with fixed CI for 3.8, courtesy of @jayvdb
   * As a result of all this, setup.py's lint subcommand was removed. Please run the commands directly instead.
* 🧹 Lots of refactoring , bug fixes, and updates to be more in line with latest C++ and Google style standards.

See [CHANGELOG.rst](https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/blob/2.0.0/CHANGELOG.rst) for a full changelog, including quite a bit of features not mentioned here.

## New Contributors
* @geoffviola made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/94
* @jspricke made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/214
* @miker2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/216
* @aaronliu0130 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/239 and is now a maintainer
* @jayvdb made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/243 and is now a maintainer
* @vyasr made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/269
* @ember91 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/278
* @nate-thirdwave made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/282
* @RafaelGSS and @aduh95 made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/287
* @armandas made their first contribution in https://github.com/cpplint/cpplint/pull/288
